name: GrimoirSmith (Killian Delias (crazyk1k1))
description:
GrimoirSmith is a Global Game Jam project with "Repair" as theme.

You incarnate a GrimoirSmith who will repaired a celtic grimoir by exploring the story of this.
To repair it you need to restore all breakpoint of the story by resolving enigma.
To do it you will use runes and decors who once took are replaced by word to make combo that can repair the breakpoint.

Game Designer team:
